Address.Address1: 89 SOI WAT SUAN PLU, CHAROENKRUNG ROAD,BANGRAK,

Description.Text: Facilities include 2 large outdoor swimming pools set in tropical gardens, one of which has a private jacuzzi. The fully equipped health club, conference room and clinic are located on the 3rd floor between the building connection. 2 tennis courts, 2 squash courts and a beauty salon are also available to complete the true deluxe class property. The hotel also has Tuk Tuk service between the 2 buidlings and shuttle boat service to the nearby River City shopping centre. Shuttle bus service is available to various happening spots such as Silom, Wireless, Rajdamri, Rama IV and South Sathorn including China Town and Suan Lum Night Bazaar. Helipad service is also available. This hotel is very well known on its state of art conference facilities with one large ballroom and another 13 smaller conference rooms. 8 conference rooms are located on the 3rd floor of Krungthep Wing and 4 are on the basement level of Shangri-La Wing offering a garden view. Hotel as well offers a world famous dinner cruise along Chaopraya river. (02/08SW)

The hotel is located on the Chao Phra River approximately 100 metres from the junction of Silom Road and the new road. Guests can also access the other side of this hotel at Krungthep wing from sky train station, Taksin, which is within 2 minutes' walking distance.

Each of these very large rooms have riverfront private garden balconies. They have exceptional bathrooms with separate walk in showers. Rooms are decorated with Thai traditional painting to reflect Thai life in the old era. With Horizon Club rooms, the guest will receive complimentary daily breakfast, cocktail and canap√©s during 17.30 -19.30 hours, coffee, tea soft drinks in Club Lounge. Moreover with complimentary pressing of one suit upon arrival and two hours usage of meeting room per day. This room type located on 23rd-25th floor.

The hotel consists of 2 wings. The main wing is called Shangri-la Wing and the other the Krungthep Wing. Both wings of the deluxe hotel are landmark modern concrete high-rise towers. The Shangri-La Wing houses 670 rooms over 25 storeys and the Krungthep Wing has 174 rooms over 16 storeys.

The hotel has totally 8 restaurants and 4 refreshment bars offering a range of cuisines from Japanese, Chinese, Italian and international to Thai. The hotel also has a dinner cruise serving international buffet.

The very large lobby of the older Shangri-La Wing is gracious and overlooks theChaopraya River. The exclusive Krungthep Wing has a traditional lobby that is arguably Bangkok's most impressive. Plenty of seating areas are available in both wings.
